title: Client says im offline and cant log in
body:
Hey guys! So had some trouble, client was saying I was offline when my internet was working fine. 

FIXED: I restarted my computer then reopened league and it needed to update. IS NOW WORKING so if this happens to you I would recommend restarting your comp first. Cheers !

replies.body: Glad you were able to get logged in finally! We were having a couple server issues around that time actually, so it might have been due to that tbh.
